responses: Hi there, how can I help?
I can direct you to your nearest Taco Bell, send you contact information, give you a recommendation, tell you today's deals, and give you a fun fact!
Offering support for directions, contact information, recommendations, deals, and fun facts!

patterns: How do I find your location?
responses: We are located at 512 E Green Street
Come visit us at 512 E Green Street

patterns: Can you tell me a fun fact?
responses: Taco Bell is named after our founder, Glen Bell
The first Taco Bell location had fire pits and mariachi bands
